languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, вы в порядке?" {n}Бывший блюститель, а ныне {d|Encyclopedia:HrotkoPriest}послушник{/d} Хротко не утратил привычного холодного спокойствия, несмотря на то, что белые его одежды перепачканы кровью.{/n}

"Lord Captain, are you unharmed?" {n}Hrotko, formerly an enforcer and now an {d|Encyclopedia:HrotkoPriest}initiate{/d}, has not lost his usual cold composure, despite the fact that his white robes are stained with blood.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, вы в порядке?" {n}Бывший блюститель, а ныне {d|Encyclopedia:HrotkoPriest}послушник{/d} Хротко не утратил привычного холодного спокойствия, несмотря на то, что белые его одежды перепачканы кровью.{/n}

"Lord Captain, are you unharmed?" {n}Hrotko, formerly an enforcer and now an {d|Encyclopedia:HrotkoPriest}initiate{/d}, has not lost his usual cold composure, despite the fact that his white robes are stained with blood.{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Captain, seid Ihr unversehrt?" {n}Hrotko, der einstige Enforcer und frisch gebackene {d|Encyclopedia:HrotkoPriest}Novize{/d}, hat sein kühles Auftreten nicht verloren, allerdings sind seine weißen Roben mittlerweile blutverschmiert.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, are you unharmed?" {n}Hrotko, formerly an enforcer and now an {d|Encyclopedia:HrotkoPriest}initiate{/d}, has not lost his usual cold composure, despite the fact that his white robes are stained with blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, seid Ihr unversehrt?" {n}Hrotko, der einstige Enforcer und frisch gebackene Novize, hat sein kühles Auftreten nicht verloren, allerdings sind seine weißen Roben mittlerweile blutverschmiert.{/n}

"Lord Captain, seid Ihr unversehrt?" {n}Hrotko, der einstige Enforcer und frisch gebackene Novize, hat sein kühles Auftreten nicht verloren, allerdings sind seine weißen Roben mittlerweile blutverschmiert.{/n}

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, vous allez bien ? » {n}Hrotko, ancien prévôt devenu {d|Encyclopedia:HrotkoPriest}initié{/d}, n'a rien perdu de sa froideur habituelle, bien que ses robes blanches soient couvertes de sang.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, are you unharmed?" {n}Hrotko, formerly an enforcer and now an {d|Encyclopedia:HrotkoPriest}initiate{/d}, has not lost his usual cold composure, despite the fact that his white robes are stained with blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, vous allez bien ? » {n}Hrotko, ancien prévôt devenu initié, n'a rien perdu de sa froideur habituelle, bien que ses robes blanches soient couvertes de sang.{/n}

« {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, vous allez bien ? » {n}Hrotko, ancien prévôt devenu initié, n'a rien perdu de sa froideur habituelle, bien que ses robes blanches soient couvertes de sang.{/n}

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, ¿se encuentra bien?». {n}Hrotko, que fue agente de seguridad y ahora es un {d|Encyclopedia:HrotkoPriest}iniciado{/d}, conserva su habitual compostura gélida a pesar de que su túnica blanca está manchada de sangre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, are you unharmed?" {n}Hrotko, formerly an enforcer and now an {d|Encyclopedia:HrotkoPriest}initiate{/d}, has not lost his usual cold composure, despite the fact that his white robes are stained with blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, ¿se encuentra bien?». {n}Hrotko, que fue agente de seguridad y ahora es un iniciado, conserva su habitual compostura gélida a pesar de que su túnica blanca está manchada de sangre.{/n}

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、あなたは武器をお持ちでないのですか？」{n}かつてはエンフォーサーで、今は{d|Encyclopedia:HrotkoPriest}イニシエイト{/d}であるフロトコは、白いローブが血で汚れているにもかかわらず、いつもの冷静さは失っていない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, are you unharmed?" {n}Hrotko, formerly an enforcer and now an {d|Encyclopedia:HrotkoPriest}initiate{/d}, has not lost his usual cold composure, despite the fact that his white robes are stained with blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、あなたは武器をお持ちでないのですか？」{n}かつてはエンフォーサーで、今はイニシエイトであるフロトコは、白いローブが血で汚れているにもかかわらず、いつもの冷静さは失っていない。{/n}

languages.text: “舰长大人，您没有受伤吧？”{n}赫洛卡曾是位执法者，如今担任{d|Encyclopedia:HrotkoPriest}助祭{/d}一职。尽管他的白色长袍上沾满了鲜血，但他依然保持着一贯的冷静、沉着。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, are you unharmed?" {n}Hrotko, formerly an enforcer and now an {d|Encyclopedia:HrotkoPriest}initiate{/d}, has not lost his usual cold composure, despite the fact that his white robes are stained with blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，您没有受伤吧？”{n}赫洛卡曾是位执法者，如今担任助祭一职。尽管他的白色长袍上沾满了鲜血，但他依然保持着一贯的冷静、沉着。{/n}
“舰长大人，您没有受伤吧？”{n}赫洛卡曾是位执法者，如今担任助祭一职。尽管他的白色长袍上沾满了鲜血，但他依然保持着一贯的冷静、沉着。{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, zarar görmediniz umarım?" {n}Eski bir infazcı olan {d|Encyclopedia:HrotkoPriest}zangoç{/d} Hrotko, cübbeleri kan lekeleriyle dolu olmasına rağmen alışılageldik soğukkanlılığını kaybetmemiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, are you unharmed?" {n}Hrotko, formerly an enforcer and now an {d|Encyclopedia:HrotkoPriest}initiate{/d}, has not lost his usual cold composure, despite the fact that his white robes are stained with blood.{/n}
